dt: {bc}the ion in an electrolyzed solution that migrates to the anode

et: Greek, neuter of {it}aniōn{/it}, present participle of {it}anienai{/it} to go up, from {it}ana-{/it} + {it}ienai{/it} to go {ma}{mat|issue:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: the ion in an electrolyzed solution that migrates to the anode; broadly : a negatively charged ion
